cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)
project(bpnet.linux)

add_library (libbpfind libbpfind.f)


set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 98)
include_directories(include)
add_executable(bpnet.linux main.cpp
        include/graph.h
        include/disjointset.h
        include/sysparams.h 
        include/sec_seq.h 
        include/ntvariants.h 
        include/sgraph.h
        include/bio/allsurfacepoints.h
        include/bio/atom.h
        include/bio/atomsurfpoints.h
        include/bio/atomvariantinfo.h
        include/bio/chaininfo.h
        include/bio/filedata.h
        include/bio/gen.h
        include/bio/globals.h
        include/bio/nutil.h
        include/bio/outfilebaseinfo.h
        include/bio/outfilerow.h
        include/bio/outfilerowarray.h
        include/bio/params.h
        include/bio/residueclass.h
        include/bio/rnaallresidues.h
        include/bio/rnacordatafile.h
        include/bio/surfacecluster.h
        include/bio/surfacedatafile.h
        include/bio/util.h
        include/biogen/geometry.h
        include/biogen/list.h
        include/biogen/stack.h
        include/biogen/stat.h
        include/biogen/stringarray.h
        include/biogen/tree.h
        include/rnabpdb/bp_db_file.h
        include/rnabpdb/rna_bp_db_all_overlap.h
        include/rnabpdb/rnabpdbcorfile.h
        include/seq/overlapseq.h
        include/seq/overlapseq_old.h
        include/seq/primaryseq.h
        include/seq/seqdata.h
        include/seq/seqgen.h
        include/seq/seqstat.h
        include/overlap.h)
        target_link_libraries (bpnet.linux lgfortran libbpfind)
